name: FairyTale City
description:
***Thank you for making FairyTale City a wildly popular success!***

****ATTENTION PLAYERS!!****

You can get FREE gems in the game through a variety of ways to get ahead faster. Here's how:

* Level up: 1 gem per level up.

* Quest completion: Quests that require gems give you back more gems.

* Daily Rewards: Coming back for consecutive days.

* Collections: Completed collections can be traded in for energy and gems.

* Sharing your achievements get you gems.

* Syncing your game with Apple's game center gives you 5 free gems.

*****ENERGY****

Energy bars have been increased in size across all levels!

So keep playing and have fun!

Build a magical city, and watch all your favorite fairy tales unfold in this world of fantasy.

FairyTale City is a city-building game with a twist: It happens in a fantasy world, where fairy tales come alive. Start with farming, build businesses to grow your city, add magical animals and trees, and increase your city population to make it a bustling, thriving city. As you progress, watch Cinderella arrive and settle in your city hoping you would help her meet her Prince Charming! Grow your FairyTale City, and welcome all your favorite fairy tale characters.

Features include:

>Harvest magical crops, grow candy in your farm.
>Make money by running magical businesses.
>Help Cinderella with her Fairy Tale wedding.
>Save Snow White from the evil queen.
>Exciting quests based on all famous fairy tales.
>New content added frequently.
>Share your achievements and progress on Facebook, Twitter and Mail.


PLEASE NOTE: FairyTale City is free to play, but charges real money for additional in-app content. If you do not wish to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases from device settings.

Catch us on Twitter: @fairytalecity

Catch us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fairytalecity

We’ll be adding loads of new content: tell us what you would like to see in your fairytale city!

FairyTale City is OpenFeint's Free Game of the Day! Download the Game Channel app to get a FREE game every day!
